mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(cultureno, cname ,raddress,lattitude, longitude, addr_code, phone, date, operatingtime, pa) VALUES (member_seq.nextval,#{cname}, #{raddress}, #{lattitude}, #{longitude}, #{addr_code}, #{phone}, sysdate, #{operatingtime}, #{pa})
mapper.select: SELECT cname, raddress, lattitude, longitude, addr_code,phone,date, operatingtime,pa FROM culturefacility ORDER BY cultureno ASC, cname ASC
